title: Air Freight
paragraphs: ILS EXPRESS offers fast, secure, and reliable air shipping solutions for your deliveries to destinations around the world. Our air freight services are designed to meet tight deadlines while ensuring optimal supply chain performance.

sections.title: Overview of Services
sections.content: We provide tailored international air freight solutions for urgent or specialized shipments, with maximum flexibility and reliability.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: Dedicated air freight experts, global network, strict compliance with international standards, and customized solutions for each client.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Question
FrequentlyQuestion.content: How does ILS EXPRESS ensure air cargo arrives on time? Our team works closely with global partners and uses optimized routes to guarantee punctual deliveries.

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.description: Priority handling to ensure your shipments arrive on time.

features.title: Customized Solutions
features.description: Air freight plans tailored to your cargo and deadlines.

features.title: Global Reach
features.description: Worldwide delivery through trusted partners.

features.title: Dedicated Support
features.description: Expert assistance and real-time shipment tracking.

title: International Road Transport (TIR)
paragraphs: ILS EXPRESS provides efficient and flexible international road transport services, ensuring optimal delivery worldwide through an extensive and secure network.

sections.title: Overview of Services
sections.content: We offer national and cross-border road transport solutions, covering a wide logistics network to ensure smooth and punctual deliveries.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: International coverage, express transport, temperature-controlled vehicles, and flexible logistics options.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Question
FrequentlyQuestion.content: Can ILS EXPRESS handle cross-border road transport? Yes, our extensive network allows us to manage shipments throughout Europe and beyond.

features.title: Reliable Transport
features.description: Fast and secure road deliveries across multiple countries.

features.title: Wide Coverage
features.description: Extensive TIR network for international delivery.

features.title: Real-Time Tracking
features.description: Full visibility from pickup to delivery.

features.title: Flexible Solutions
features.description: Adaptable services for different cargo types.

title: Sea Freight (FCL)
paragraphs: ILS EXPRESS offers cost-effective and secure sea freight services for full container shipments (FCL), ensuring reliable international delivery.

sections.title: Overview of Services
sections.content: We manage end-to-end international sea transport with dedicated FCL solutions supported by a global network of certified agents and warehouses.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: Door-to-Door service, customs clearance, and expert handling of specialized cargo.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Question
FrequentlyQuestion.content: Does ILS EXPRESS handle dangerous or perishable goods? Yes, our team is trained and certified to manage specialized cargo safely.

features.title: Door-to-Door Service
features.description: Complete management from departure to final delivery.

features.title: Special Cargo Handling
features.description: Expertise in dangerous, perishable, and sensitive goods.

features.title: Global Network
features.description: Reliable connections with certified agents worldwide.

features.title: Cost-Effective
features.description: Optimized sea freight solutions for full containers.

title: Maritime Groupage (LCL)
paragraphs: ILS EXPRESS provides shared sea freight (LCL) solutions to optimize shipping costs while ensuring reliable and efficient maritime transport.

sections.title: Overview of Services
sections.content: Our LCL services allow multiple shipments to be consolidated in one container, reducing costs and maintaining reliable transit times.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: Regular departures, flexible scheduling, optimized space, and real-time tracking of shipments.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Question
FrequentlyQuestion.content: How does groupage reduce shipping costs? By consolidating shipments, you only pay for the space you use.

features.title: Cost Optimization
features.description: Pay only for the space you need in shared containers.

features.title: Regular Departures
features.description: Scheduled LCL shipments for reliable delivery.

features.title: Real-Time Tracking
features.description: Full visibility of your consolidated shipment.

features.title: Flexible Solutions
features.description: Adapted to different volumes and destinations.

title: Customs & International Transit
paragraphs: ILS EXPRESS simplifies and optimizes your customs and transit formalities for smooth and compliant import-export operations.

sections.title: Overview of Services
sections.content: Our customs experts handle all administrative procedures, ensuring fast clearance and compliance with international regulations.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: Expert agents, rapid processing, document preparation, and transparent communication.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Question
FrequentlyQuestion.content: How does ILS EXPRESS help with customs clearance? Our team prepares and submits all required documents to avoid delays.

features.title: Quick Clearance
features.description: Efficient handling of customs procedures.

features.title: Expert Guidance
features.description: Professional support to navigate complex regulations.

features.title: Regulatory Compliance
features.description: Strict adherence to local and international laws.

features.title: Transparent Process
features.description: Clear communication and tracking at every step.
